Salesforce Components - TriggerHandler
Overview    Classes    Enums    Interfaces    Triggers    SObjects    Groups    Index




Class TriggerHandler

public virtual class TriggerHandler

Known derived/implementing types:
AccountContactRelationTriggerHandler, AccountTriggerHandler, AdjustmentTriggerHandler, BankAccountTriggerHandler, BillAdjustmentTriggerHandler, BillCollectionTriggerHandler, BillCommissionTriggerHandler, BillPaymentTriggerHandler, BillTriggerHandler, CaseTriggerHandler, CollectionInvoiceTriggerHandler, CommissionPaymentTriggerHandler, ComponentTriggerHandler, DatedConversionRateTriggerHandler, EmailMessageTriggerHandler, InvoiceTriggerHandler, LeadTriggerHandler, Payment2TriggerHandler, ProductTypeTriggerHandler, StripeReferenceTriggerHandler, StripeTransactionTriggerHandler

Description: This trigger framework bundles a single TriggerHandler base class that you can inherit from in all of your trigger handlers. The base class includes context-specific methods that are automatically called when a trigger is executed. References: https://github.com/kevinohara80/sfdc-trigger-framework

Changes

04/25/2021 Initial version. 12/04/2021 Method isDisabled. 05/22/2022 New methods to count loops, validate loop numbers and validate first runs. 05/22/2022 New methods to validate fields updates. 05/22/2022 New methods to enable and disable handler methods without modifying custom settings. 07/10/2022 Now trigger methods can be enabled/disabled using the custom metadata type TriggerSettings__mdt.

Parameters:

    [boolean] true if method is enabled (programmatically or in custom settings)

public Boolean isFirstLoop()

Returns true if trigger is running its first loop in the current context (before insert, after insert, before update, ...)

Returns:
    true if first loop, false otherwise

public Boolean isFirstRun()

Returns true the first time the method is called in the current context (before insert, after insert, before update, ...)

Returns:
    true if first time, false otherwise

public Boolean isFirstRun(String executionId)

Returns true the first time the method is called for the given execution Id

Returns:
    true if first time, false otherwise

public Boolean isNewOrUpdated(
  SObject so,
  String fieldName
)

Validate if a record is new or if a field has been modified in an update trigger

Parameters:
    so – [sObject] record to validate
    fieldName – [string] field to validate

Returns:
    true if current context is an insert trigger or if field has been modified in an update trigger

    fieldName – [string] field to validate

    fieldName – [string] field to validate

public Boolean isNotFirstLoop()

Returns true if trigger has already run a loop in the current context (before insert, after insert, before update, ...)

Returns:
    false if first loop, true otherwise

public Boolean isNotFirstRun()

Returns true if method has already been called in the current context (before insert, after insert, before update, ...)

Returns:
    false if first time, true otherwise

public Boolean isNotFirstRun(String executionId)

Returns true if method has already been called for the given execution Id

Returns:
    false if first time, true otherwise

  String fieldName
)

    fieldName – [string] field to validate
